list_definition_mean.definitions_word_en: the science or practice of the diagnosis, treatment, and prevention of disease (in technical use often taken to exclude surgery).
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_en: he made distinguished contributions to pathology and medicine
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_vn: Ông đã thực hiện những đóng góp nổi bật với bệnh lý và y học

list_definition_mean.definitions_word_en: a compound or preparation used for the treatment or prevention of disease, especially a drug or drugs taken by mouth.
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_vn: cho cô ấy một ít thuốc

list_definition_mean.definitions_word_en: (especially among some North American Indian peoples) a spell, charm, or fetish believed to have healing, protective, or other power.
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_en: Fleur was murdering him by use of bad medicine
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_vn: Fleur đã giết anh ta bằng cách sử dụng thuốc xấu
